name: Adidas Runners Strength Training + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running performance and recovery with our Strength + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted mobility exercises with a relaxed run to help you move better and feel stronger.

This session is suitable for runners of all levels looking to improve mobility, recover effectively, and enjoy a stress-free run.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners Aerobic Run & Mobility
about:
Boost your endurance and recovery with our Aerobic Run & Mobility session! This event blends a steady-paced aerobic run with a guided stretching routine to enhance your performance and flexibility.

This session is ideal for runners of all levels who want to work on their endurance and finish feeling refreshed and relaxed.

name: Adidas Runners Easy Run + Stretching
about:
Refresh your mind and body with our Easy Run + Stretching! This event combines a relaxed run with a rejuvenating stretching session, offering the perfect balance of movement and mindfulness.

Perfect for runners of all levels, especially those looking to unwind, recover, and explore the benefits of yoga for their training.

Run easy, stretch deeply, and rejuvenate fully. Join us for this harmonious session to refresh your body and mind!

name: Adidas Runners Plyometrics + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running performance and recovery with our Plyometrics + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted mobility exercises with a relaxed run to help you move better and feel stronger.

This session is suitable for runners of all levels looking to improve mobility, recover effectively, and enjoy a stress-free run.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Ignite your pace and build explosive power with our Speed Session! This high-energy workout focuses on improving your running speed, efficiency, and stamina through structured intervals.

Ideal for runners of all levels—whether you're aiming to shave seconds off your race time or simply challenge yourself with a fun, fast-paced workout.

Let’s rev up the pace, power through the session, and take your running to the next level. See you on the track!

name: Adidas Runners Speed Intervals  + Stretching followed by Chat with Tapas Banerjee - Ultra Runner (Border 160 kms)
about:
Get ready for an intense Speed Interval Session, designed to boost your pace, endurance, and race performance. After the workout, unwind with a deep stretching session to aid recovery, followed by an exclusive chat with Tapas Banerjee, an ultra runner who conquered the grueling Border 160 km race!

All runners are welcome—whether you're working on speed or looking for inspiration from an ultra runner's journey.

Let’s run, recover, and learn from an ultra-running legend!

name: Adidas Runners Band Activation + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running efficiency and prevent injuries with our Band Activation + Easy Run session! This workout focuses on activating key muscle groups using resistance bands, followed by a relaxed-paced run.

Ideal for runners of all levels looking to improve strength, stability, and injury prevention.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
gnite your pace and build explosive power with our Speed Session! This high-energy workout focuses on improving your running speed, efficiency, and stamina through structured intervals.

Ideal for runners of all levels—whether you're aiming to shave seconds off your race time or simply challenge yourself with a fun, fast-paced workout.

Let’s rev up the pace, power through the session, and take your running to the next level. See you on the track!

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Allyship Relay Run + Stretching
about:
Join us for a special With Women We Run (WWWR) Allyship Relay Run, celebrating support, inclusivity, and teamwork in running. This unique session is designed to highlight the importance of allies in the running community, encouraging men and women to run together in a fun, interactive relay format.

Open to all runners, regardless of experience—come as a team or find a partner on the spot!

Let’s run together, uplift each other, and celebrate allyship on the track!

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Ally Special
about:
Join us for a With Women We Run (WWWR) Easy Run, a supportive and inclusive session designed to bring women together through the power of running. Whether you're new to running or looking for a relaxed-paced community run, this session is all about movement, connection, and empowerment.

Open to all women, from beginners to seasoned runners, looking for a stress-free, enjoyable run.

Run strong, run together—because with women, we run!
